faq.question: What is Cognitive Campus?
faq.answer: Cognitive Campus is an advanced student productivity platform that uses AI to enhance learning, project management, and personal organization. It integrates with Google Classroom to provide a comprehensive academic management system.

faq.question: How does the AI assistant work?
faq.answer: Our Cognitive Assistant operates in two modes: Normal Mode for general queries and Context Mode for platform-specific help. It provides contextual responses, helps with note summarization, generates AI notes, optimizes your schedule, and can even generate images based on prompts.

faq.question: Can I upgrade my plan?
faq.answer: Yes, you can upgrade from Basic to Standard or Premium plans to access more features and higher limits. Upgrades are processed through our secure Stripe payment gateway.

faq.question: How does Google Classroom integration work?
faq.answer: Cognitive Campus automatically imports your Google Classroom courses, announcements, assignments, and grades. You can then activate courses based on your subscription plan limits.

faq.question: What are the project collaboration features?
faq.answer: Projects include branches for organization, team member management, task assignment with progress tracking, a dedicated group chat, a README section, a notice board, and project-specific notes.

faq.question: How does two-factor authentication work?
faq.answer: When enabled, 2FA sends a 6-digit code to your email after login. You must enter this code to complete authentication. You can enable or disable 2FA from your profile page.

faq.question: What AI features are available for notes?
faq.answer: AI features include note summarization, PDF analysis and note generation, prompt-based note creation, and image generation. Usage limits vary by subscription plan.
